gen:link.msg:message: `AssetsNoncurrent` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit9_AssetsNoncurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit9_AssetsNoncurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit9_ChildrenOfAssetsNoncurrentDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit9_ChildrenOfAssetsNoncurrentDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit9_ChildrenOfAssetsNoncurrentCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit9_ChildrenOfAssetsNoncurrentCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Assets` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_Assets')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_Assets return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
`BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults` SHOULD not exist for any period other than the current period.

`EquityAndLiabilities` SHOULD be equal to + `Assets`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetInvestmentFirm_PrtFST101Variable1_EquityAndLiabilities')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetInvestmentFirm_PrtFST101Variable1_EquityAndLiabilities return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetInvestmentFirm_PrtFST101Variable1_Assets')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetInvestmentFirm_PrtFST101Variable1_Assets return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
